hero.introducation: I'm a developer specialized in {{ Next.js, React, Typescript, Postgres }} and  {{ Prisma. }} With a degree in  {{ Systems Analysis and Development  }}from {{ Fatec Rio Preto,  }} I constantly seek challenges that make me grow and create high-impact digital applications.
hero.introducation2: Currently, I've been honing my {{ skills }} through hands-on projects and ongoing {{ experiences }}, always striving to evolve as a {{ Full-Stack Developer. }}

about.title: About Me
about.about: Throughout my journey, I graduated in {{ Systems Analysis and Development }} from Fatec Rio Preto and also took several additional courses to expand my knowledge of modern technologies used in the actual market.
about.about2: I currently work as a developer focusing on web applications using {{ TypeScript, React, and Next.js }} on the front end, in addition to working on the {{ back end }} with {{ Node.js }}, {{ ASP.NET }}, and databases such as {{ PostgreSQL + Prisma }} and {{ Firebird }}, building complete systems with a focus on performance and scalability.
about.about3: I'm constantly learning and evolving, striving to hone my skills through new projects, ongoing studies, and best development practices.
about.about4: My {{ career goal }} is to grow as a full-stack developer, applying my knowledge in projects that challenge me and contribute to my ongoing development.

activities: Development and maintenance of web applications
Creation of REST APIs with ASP.NET Core
Migration of desktop system to web
Creation of REST APIs and system integrations
Requirement analysis and direct communication with clients
Deployment and maintenance of applications in production
Complete management of the IT sector and technological infrastructure
Technical support to users and Windows Server administration
Implementation and management of networks, VPNs, DNS, and domains
Technical support to internal users and resolution of system problems
Support in the maintenance and optimization of the IT infrastructure
Configuration and preparation of machines and equipment for employees
Preventive maintenance and updates to ensure system stability
Basic PLC programming applied to industrial automation
Development of projects and prototypes using Arduino
Installation and maintenance of industrial electrical circuits
Application of safety standards and best practices in the industrial environment

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I’m always open to new connections and opportunities. If you have any questions, would like to discuss an idea, or are looking for a partnership, I’d be happy to chat. Feel free to message me on my social media channels below, and I’ll do my best to respond promptly.
contact.description2: I love learning from new experiences and challenges. Whether it's to share ideas, ask for advice or discuss future projects, I'm here to help. Let's exchange ideas and explore new possibilities together!
contact.description3: Feel free to explore my repositories, contribute new features, connect with me on Linkedin, send me an email or even invite me for a virtual coffee.
